subject: Dreamweaver CS3 ready to download
body:
Myths which are believed in tend to become true.

Try to be the best of what you are, even if what you are is no good.

We all know that sponges grow in the ocean but I wander how much deeper the ocean would be if that wasn't the case.

The desire to seem clever often keeps us from being so.

The tallest trees are most in the power of the winds, and ambitious men of the blasts of fortune.

But fantasy kills imagination, pornography is death to art.

Let us not be ashamed to speak what we shame not to think.

An artist is a creature driven by demons. He doesn't know why they choose him and he's usually too busy to wonder why.

It's easier to be wise for others than for ourselves.

I can't tell you how many shows I've done with full-blown migraine headaches.

Surmounting difficulty is the crucible that forms character.

Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together.

Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
